column4: anyone around that can answer questions re: 32-bit vs. 64-bit?

on the desktop edition download page (http://www.ubuntu.com/desktop/get-ubuntu/download) it says 32-bit is recommended, but at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/32bit_and_64bit it says 64-bit is recommended.  why the discrepancy?
with 6gb of ram would 64-bit be recommended on an amd turion 2?
